reviews.review_msg: Nice prof! very easy going but not organized. The amount of work is fair and manageable!
Best teacher I ever had in my 4 years at SFU; knowledgeable and demonstrates a huge interest in course material; class discussions were great; will recommend him to others
Hannah...a great prof.She knows her stuff and made it a fun and interesting class. She wants all her students to do well and is always willing to help as long as you put int the effort.

Nick is a really nice guy & you can tell he wants you to do well, but his lectures are long-winded, often off tangent & his grading criteria isn't very specific. I found his choice of readings long & sometimes dull. He is sometimes difficult to get in contact with but he is an easy marker, doesn't assign many assignments & gives awesome feedback.
